Event.Text:
Reed grabed a few bottles of our strongest clear spirits, emptying one and filling it with water, giggling incessantly to himself. He explains that he is going to challenge all the other rover occupants into a chugging match, wait until they are all unconcious, and loot all of their alcohol.
Not 5 minutes later, Reed returns with 2 kegs in tow and some of their other supplies, obviously proud of his accomplishment.
